content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Rodger Dickson has over 30 years’ experience in the marine and offshore sectors with particular focus on offshore operations, project Marine Warranty Services and marine consultancy. Mr Dickson is a specialist on jack-up operations, location approvals and all aspects of rig moving. He has a proven track record of technical and management experience. Mr Dickson is based in Dubai, UAE.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Contact

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
